pullrequest.title: adding practice worlds for stationkeeping and wayfinding

content.raw:
Thank you! I thought I also remembered that they would not be available during the competition, but I did not know how this would work. I thought @{557058:4ded1ddf-947e-4154-bbd1-3dba24f1bdbd} mentioned there was a way to turn them off?

‌
content.html:
Thank you! I thought I also remembered that they would not be available during the competition, but I did not know how this would work. I thought @Carlos Agüero mentioned there was a way to turn them off?
